Claude Code on Windows requires git-bash (https://git-scm.com/downloads/win). If installed but not in PATH, set environment variable pointing to your bash.exe, similar to: CLAUDE_CODE_GIT_BASH_PATH=C:\Program Files\Git\bin\bash.exe Git Bash è·¯å¾„ç¡®è®¤ é¦–å…ˆç¡®è®¤ä½ çš„ Git Bash å®‰è£…ä½ç½®ï¼š Git Bash bash.exe Git Command Line E:\ scoop\ apps\ git\ 2.50.0\ bin\ bash.exe ç›®æ ‡è·¯å¾„ï¼š E:\scoop\apps\git\2.50.0\bin\bash.exe è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ è®¾ç½®ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ CLAUDE_CODE_GIT_BASH_PATH æŒ‡å‘ä½ çš„ Git Bash è·¯å¾„ã€‚ å˜é‡åï¼š CLAUDE_CODE_GIT_BASH_PATH å˜é‡å€¼ï¼š E:\scoop\apps\git\2.50.0\bin\bash.exe æ–¹æ³• 1ï¼šé€šè¿‡ PowerShell è®¾ç½®ï¼ˆæ¨èï¼‰ PS C:\Users\User> SetEnvironmentVariable(...) âœ“ Success PowerShell Terminal 1 PowerShell ç®¡ç†å‘˜è¿è¡Œ ä»¥ç®¡ç†å‘˜èº«ä»½æ‰“å¼€ PowerShell æŒ‰ Win + X â†’ é€‰æ‹© "Windows PowerShellï¼ˆç®¡ç†å‘˜ï¼‰" æ‰§è¡Œè®¾ç½®å‘½ä»¤ [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("CLAUDE_CODE_GIT_BASH_PATH", "E:\scoop\apps\git\2.50.0\
